sentences.sentence: That belief persisted through the 17th century, even as bodily griminess reached new heights.
sentences.translation: 这种信念持续了整个十七世纪，当时，身体污秽也达到新的高度。

sentences.sentence: Their hopes for the LAB are similar and we hope all the quirks, griminess, beauty and attitude of our hometown can be surfaced in the space and contribute to the dialogue of this global experiment.
sentences.translation: 他们对实验室的希望是类似的，我们希望所有独特的习惯，丑陋，美丽和对家乡的态度可以在空间中被表现出来，并且为这段全球性的实验做出贡献。
